name: FAST AVIATION ACADEMY, INC.
about: FAST Aviation Academy, Inc. is a premier institution for professional pilot training, approved by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines. With over 30 years of experience, we have trained numerous students from around the world to meet global aviation standards set by ICAO, EASA, and FAA. Our curriculum is designed to ensure excellence in safety and aircraft maintenance, making us a reputable maintenance organization as well. We offer a range of courses, including Commercial Pilotâ€™s License, and are authorized to repair and overhaul aircraft. Our 24/7 customer service and well-maintained fleet ensure that students receive top-notch training, preparing them for successful careers in commercial airlines. We take care of all logistical needs, including student visa permits and medical exams, to make the enrollment process seamless. Join us to achieve your dream of becoming a professional pilot.
services:
["Private Pilot Course
Commercial Pilot Course
Instrument Rating Course
Flight Instructor Course
Aircraft Maintenance Technology (AMT)
Aviation Electronics Technology (AVT)"]
